attachments.text: Is this code correct? Can I combine promises like that? var data = {} await getInfo(<http://data.com|data.com>) .then(result => {data = result}) .catch(error => {}) doStuffOnlyAfterGetInfo(data)

text:
do I have to start with an $and?

```{founded_year: [{$lt: 2000}, {$gt: 2005}]}```

elements.text: do I have to start with an $and?

text:
you don't have to, you can combine the two as one object:
```{ founded_year: { $lt: 2000, $gt: 2005 } }```

elements.text: you don't have to, you can combine the two as one object:

text: and you might have the order wrong.

because what you search for is
